content:
For some reason this PR (#33613) timed out during the lint mathlib step (taking over 6 hrs total): https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/20723731691/job/59494054270.

I tried to merge master and retry and it is currently almost 5 hours on the lint mathlib step.

Whats going on here?
This is a known issue: #mathlib4 > slow linting step CI? Unfortunately, we still haven't gotten to the bottom of it yet. If you see this happen again you can just cancel the job and restart it.
